meanings.definition: A sweet dessert made with milk, sugar, and flour.
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious puddings for dessert last night.
meanings.sent2: I love eating puddings after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The puddings were so good, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a bowl of puddings.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked puddings filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A savory dish made with meat, vegetables, and gravy.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a hearty puddings for the main course.
meanings.sent2: Puddings with gravy are a comforting meal on a cold day.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the puddings on the floor, what a mess!
meanings.sent4: The secret ingredient in her puddings was love.
meanings.sent5: The savory smell of the puddings cooking made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A thick, soft mass of something.
meanings.sent1: The mud in the garden turned into sticky puddings after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The batter formed into thick puddings as it cooked.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's hands were covered in sticky puddings.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky looked like fluffy puddings.
meanings.sent5: The artist molded the clay into smooth puddings shapes.
